welcome.farmer.Abigail: Hey {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left you some Amethyst outside your door - it's said to bring good luck, maybe it'll help you in the mines! - Abigail
welcome.farmer.Alex: Yo {0}, welcome to the neighborhood! I left some Eggs outside your door - hope you like 'em scrambled or sunny-side up! - Alex
welcome.farmer.Elliott: To {0}, a warm welcome to Pelican Town. I've left a Tom Kha Soup by your door - it's important to keep healthy! - Elliott
welcome.farmer.Emily: Dearest {0}, welcome to our little town! I left some Wool for you - maybe you can make something beautiful with it! - Emily
welcome.farmer.Haley: Hi {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left some Sunflowers by your door - they're cheerful, just like you should be here! - Haley
welcome.farmer.Harvey: Hello {0}, welcome to Pelican Town. I've left some Coffee for you - hope it helps you settle in and feel energized! - Harvey
welcome.farmer.Leah: Welcome to the valley, {0}! I left a fresh Salad outside your door - enjoy the taste of nature's bounty! - Leah
welcome.farmer.Maru: Greetings {0}, and welcome to Pelican Town! I left a Battery Pack for you - might come in handy for your farm gadgets! - Maru
welcome.farmer.Penny: Hello {0}, welcome to our quiet town. I left a Poppy by your door - a little bit of beauty to brighten your day. - Penny
welcome.farmer.Sam: Hey {0}, welcome to town! I left some Joja Cola outside - it's not the best for you, but hey, welcome gifts are welcome gifts, right? - Sam
welcome.farmer.Sebastian: Welcome, {0}. I left a Frozen Tear outside your door - you can find more on the mines near my house. - Sebastian
welcome.farmer.Shane: {0}, welcome... I guess. Left you some Beer outside - don't go wild, alright? - Shane
welcome.farmer.Caroline: Dear {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left some Parsnip Seeds by your door - a little something to get your garden started. - Caroline
welcome.farmer.Clint: Howdy {0}, welcome to town. I left some Copper Ore outside - might be useful if you're into crafting, eh? - Clint
welcome.farmer.Demetrius: Greetings {0}, and welcome to the community. I left some Bean Starter by your door - happy gardening! - Demetrius
welcome.farmer.Dwarf: ..... *[Welcome, {0}. I've left you some Ruby outside your door. May its shine and beauty inspire you!]* ..... - Dwarf
welcome.farmer.Evelyn: Dear {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left some Cookies outside your door - a little treat to welcome you. - Evelyn
welcome.farmer.George: Welcome, {0}. I left a Leek outside your door - it's good for you, whether you like it or not. - George
welcome.farmer.Gus: Welcome to the Stardrop Saloon, {0}! I left a Spaghetti outside your door - enjoy! - Gus
welcome.farmer.Jas: Hi {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left a Pink Cake outside your door - it's my favorite, hope you like it too! - Jas
welcome.farmer.Jodi: Welcome to Pelican Town, {0}! I left some Pancakes outside your door - a little something to help you settle in. - Jodi
welcome.farmer.Kent: Welcome to our town, {0}. I left some Rhubarb outside your door - it's pretty versatile in the kitchen, you'll find. - Kent
welcome.farmer.Krobus: Greetings, {0}, and welcome to Pelican Town. I left a Void Egg outside your door - it's... something special. Use it wisely. - Krobus
welcome.farmer.Lewis: Welcome to Pelican Town, {0}! I left a Parsnip outside your door - a humble but essential part of any farm. - Lewis
welcome.farmer.Linus: Welcome, {0}. I left some Wild Horseradish outside your door - adds a nice kick to any dish, if you like spice. - Linus
welcome.farmer.Marnie: Howdy {0}, welcome to the valley! I left some Hay outside your door - for your animals, whenever you get some. - Marnie
welcome.farmer.Pam: Hey {0}, welcome to town! I left you some Beer outside - come join me for a drink at the Saloon sometime! - Pam
welcome.farmer.Pierre: Welcome to my shop, {0}! I left some Potato Seeds outside your door - get your farm going! - Pierre
welcome.farmer.Robin: Hey {0}, welcome to Pelican Town! I left you 50 Wood outside your door - perfect for crafting a chest or whatever you need. - Robin
welcome.farmer.Sandy: Welcome to the Oasis, {0}! I left some Cactus Fruit outside your door - a little refreshment from the desert heat. - Sandy
welcome.farmer.Vincent: Hi {0}, welcome! I left a Grape outside your door - it's yummy! - Vincent
welcome.farmer.Willy: Ahoy there, {0}! Welcome to Pelican Town. I left some Bait outside your door - get fishing! - Willy
